title: Complete Joke

title: Banking is Ok, Trading is bad
text: I like Revolut as a second Bank account so you have a backup. The app works and transfers are usually fast. But the trading part of the app is not good at all. Missing searches for ETFs, confusing interface, ongoing redraw issues when you scroll down a list.

title: Smooth but limited in some areas.
text: One of the best designed apps I have used. Easy to execute almost all banking functions. Only issue is that document upload can be cumbersome on mobile and the web/desktop portal provides near 0 functionality so you are forced to do it all on mobile.

title: Locked out
text: Canâ€™t get into my account on app. Reset pin text or email never comes through, no phone call with pin ever comes through. Automated Phone number says use app chat. Canâ€™t login!! Canâ€™t call to check my balance, says to go use the app. No human to talk to. This company has completely checked out and has failed their customers by pretty much saying â€œehh too badâ€ and shrugging you off. Cool logo for a â€œbankâ€ I guess. Moved my paychecks to a new bank and all is well. Never using this again once I get my money out, if they EVER actually help me login. 0/5 stars.

title: Don't buy crypto on here
text:
I bought Â£5k of btc and it went to Â£5.6k and I wanted to sell and move my money back into savings and when I hit sell they say I'll only get Â£5.5k 

They take a Â£100 fee???? They already took around Â£60 when i initially bought so I had to wait for BTC to go up like 2% before breaking even... now its more like 4% when you consider the fees on both ends

Use coinbase and pay for coinbase pro. 

Bear in mind I also have revolut premium! Â£55 a month! and they still charge me these kinds of fees? Extortionate. Goodbye. I'm moving my BTC to Coinbase and cancelling my Premium account

title: Rocks!
text:
I just read some guy said this is the worst banking app ever.

I have used a lot of banking apps and this one is awesome! So many useful features. I have their prepaid credit card and it is the only card I use. This card does everything and then some. Far and away the most full featured banking app I have used. Usually, at restaurants I get the charge on my phone before the waiter returns to the table.

title: Banking in Common Sense
text:
Iâ€™ve been using Revolut since Iâ€™ve move to London and it helps me keep track of my bills in the UK and the States. Simple to use and I love my little custom card I got back in 2022. It keeps getting better with the updates and itâ€™s so nice to see a company grow. Keeps me money conscious and not anxious. 

Also love their spare change option, has helped me safe money in case things have gotten rough monetary wise and it has. 

10/10 recommend to anyone who travels a lot.

title: Does not work

title: This is a SCAM! User BEWARE
text:
I got this app because it was recommended to me for international travel. I opted for the Premium plan and ordered a chromatic card which was around $20 or so.

Three weeks later, the card has not arrived. So I proceeded to try to reach customer service via chat which is a perk of the Premium plan. Low and behold, there is no customer service live chat feature in their help bar so you have to wait for a response email from an inexistent support team. Even after sending an email, common protocol is to receive a confirmation email. However, Revolut doesnâ€™t have that, meaning your message may or may not have reached them. No way of knowing. 

Also, be aware that there is no phone number to call. For a bank in the United States to not have a customer service phone number is a huge red flag.

If you have funds left in the app, there is no way to withdraw them without having the card, which once again they didnâ€™t send. So, essentially you are stuck having money in a mysterious bank account without any customer support and you watch it get drained by the monthly premium fees. Another huge red flag.

If you terminate the premium plan early, they charge $19.98. So basically, you pay $20 for a card and $19.98 for early termination of premium plan, you cannot get your money back and you have no way to speak to somebody in order to get help. Imagine getting stuck in a foreign country being at the mercy of Revolut - it would be a total nightmare! This is a total SCAM so please do not fall for this. 

I am reporting this company to the FDIC. I hope this helps any of you readers to avoid getting scammed like I did.

title: No security, fraud
text:
DO NOT USE THIS APP, genuinely have never been more disgusted by a company that claims to be a financial institution. Revolut is fine until itâ€™s not. No customer support, no security. Money will be stolen from you on here and no one will help. Terrible customer service- the chat is the only way to contact them and it is very likely it is AI generated.

UPDATE: no one reads your messages. No one communicates. The complaints team will ghost you and gaslight you. I have actively been lied to by many of the agents. There is a fine line they are walking and I would be shocked if this app continues for more than a few more years at most. This is a lawsuit and a press release waiting to happen. Utterly disgusting and unprofessional. Shame on you.

title: Worst money app
text: Honestly my experience using this app for only a few months is honestly pretty terrible, there's no live customer support you will just get sent around in circles by a computer and you will be waiting forever for help. The "minimum" fee is $20 which is outrageous in my opinion because if someone only needed $5 per say I have to take out an extra $20 just to send it which is stupid. The thing that pisses me off the most is if someone REQUESTS money the app says "YoU OwE"... no I don't "owe them" anything that's just how much the person requested and it makes it seem like I'm in debt towards that person. Terrible app do no recommend, download any other money app but this one

title: Last update is terrible
text: The last changes to the app are terrible. They have removed all the best functionality and just made it more inconvenient or impossible to find. The watchlist has disappeared and been sort of broken down across multiple sections so there is no more overview. No idea how to manage the watchlist. Watchlist shortcut only shows 2 items and you can select which and selecting it doesnâ€™t take you to a proper overview. The converter feature has now been hidden away under a menu in the accounts screen. All the other features from the favorites button have been removed or dispersed across the app into hidden places never to be seen again. What were the developers thinking? What a mess!
